opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell and Mr. Justice Barbieri took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: J. Graham Sale, Jr., Assistant Public Defender, with him John J. Dean, Assistant Public Defender, and George II. Boss, Public Defender, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Christian, Appellant.
Argued September 30, 1971.
Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
J. Graham Sale, Jr., Assistant Public Defender, with him John J. Dean, Assistant Public Defender, and George II. Boss, Public Defender, for appellant.
Robert L. Campbell, Assistant District Attorney, with him Carol Mary Los, Assistant District Attorney, and Robert W. Duggan, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
December 20, 1971:
